GSD.product_version: versions from v4.18 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
selftests/bpf: fix a test for snprintf() overflow

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 4a5ae176fd0be385553177a3f4812a5d30c97f94, it was introduced in version v4.18 by commit c0fa1b6c3efc64b4ecfec658f95475fda650742e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: selftests/bpf: fix a test for snprintf() overflow
